method: Place the tomatoes, onion, stock, bay leaves and lamb in a large frying pan. Bring to the boil, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms and carrots and cook for 10 minutes. Stir in the tomato purée and capers. Cook uncovered, over a high heat for 2-4 minutes to reduce some of the liquid. Remove the bay leaves before serving.
ingredients: 225g/8oz tomatoes, peeled and chopped,  1 large onion, peeled and sliced into thin wedges,  3 tbsp stock,  2 bay leaves,  350g/12oz lean lamb, cut into strips,  350g/12oz closed cap mushrooms, halved,  225g/8oz carrots, peeled and cut into thick sticks,  2 tbsp capers,  2 tbsp tomato purée
